org.yamcs.yarch

Class Stream

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.yamcs.yarch.Stream
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractTableReaderStream, HistogramReaderStream, InternalStream, LimitedStream, MergeStream, OutputStream, SelectStream, SpeedLimitStream

    public abstract class Stream
extends Object
    Streams are means to transport tuples.
